price: Jinniifi ilma namaa haa na gabbaraniif malee hin uumne.
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡتُ ٱلۡجِنَّ وَٱلۡإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُونِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqtu al-jina wal-insa illā liyaʿbudūni
